Coverage decreased (-0.02%) to 69.958% when pulling **6f3e64ac792f378e0f6657beefb91f84ccdf6502 on jbonofre:BEAM-2684-AMQPIO-TEST** into **04f5bc6f805868f9ed1494128b90d33bb2fe0e66 on apache:master**.
Glad to know that it works in your env now, `mvn clean install` seems a one-size-fits-all solution.

The existing `BeamSqlUdf` is still there. Here it brings support of `SerializableFunction` as a second option. 
As discussed `SerializableFunction` can be used for one-in-one-out function, and you need to use `BeamSqlUdf` for cases with multiple parameters and/or optional parameter.
Merged, feel free to close. Thank you!
